title: Can you upgrade more than one icon?
body: because of worlds the icons for different teams can be upgraded using champion ship jewls ,and I have enough as well as the worlds gold icon so why can't I upgrade it to platnum?

replies.body: If you have enough [jewels ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)you can upgrade more Worlds team icons.
Well I have 46 and the worlds icon the one that costs 1 ip and it's not letting me upgrade it to platnum
The worlds icon for 1 ip can only be upgraded once.

Lew's information here is spot on, thanks!  The Worlds general icon doesn't have upgrades because it doesn't have special emotes or animations.  You can get  team icons through the store!  It is available through the Accessories section, and Summoner Icons on the left side.  Hope that helps!

Yes it does..... but man I feel dumb.
It should have been obvious to me.
